input.sentences: he was a bit disappointed that not many people had come to their meeting | but was hopeful that the ones who did show up would be interested .
the girl was n't sure she liked what she was hearing .
the young man told the group a story from his childhood .
the people listening were a little bored | but tried to listen .
the three men discussed whether they should just end the meeting | since nobody seemed very enthusiastic about it .
output.sentences: Mark was telling his fishing stories again.
I just stared and tried to keep up.
Jo stood behind me and chimed in every once in a wihle.
The others kind of were in disbelief his fish was that big.
They all had a good laugh after hearing Mark's fishing stories.
